com.io7m.jcage.core

Class JCPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.security.Policy
      • com.io7m.jcage.core.JCPolicy

  • public final class JCPolicy
extends Policy

    The main sandboxing Policy implementation.

    The policy maps sandbox URLs to sets of Permission values.
